Contributing Code¶

Start Contributions¶

Code Style

Develop, review, and test code following the OpenHarmony coding standards. Make sure code is written in the same style.

  • C Coding Style Guide

  • JavaScript Coding Style Guide

  • Python Coding Style Guide
